#Power analysis  
```{r, comment = '', echo = FALSE}
# Adapted from link

es <- 0.7 # Enter your summary effect size
print(paste('Summary effect size:', es, sep = " "))
as <- 73.6  # Average per number per group
print(paste('Average per number per group', as, sep = " "))
mk <- 5  # Number of effect sizes
print(paste('Number of effect sizes', mk, sep = " "))
hg <- 3  # Heterogeneity (".33" for small, "1" for moderate, & "3" for large)
print(paste('Heterogeneity', hg, sep = " "))

eq1 <- ((as+as)/((as)*(as))) + ((es^2)/(2*(as+as)))
eq2 <- hg*(eq1)
eq3 <- eq2+eq1
eq4 <- eq3/mk
eq5 <- (es/sqrt(eq4))
Power <- (1-pnorm(1.96-eq5)) # Two-tailed
print(paste('Power:', Power, sep = ''))
```
